sentences.en: The capacity of individual power stations, many of them hydro plants, rose from a few kilowatts to over a megawatt in less than a decade.
sentences.cn: 在不到十年的时间里，单个发电站的发电能力就从几千瓦上升到了几兆瓦，其中许多是水力发电站。

sentences.en: Today’ upercomputer conume more than 5 megawatt of power.
sentences.cn: 今天的超级计算机消耗超过5兆瓦的电力。

sentences.en: Cool Earth plans to open a 1-megawatt facility this summer.
sentences.cn: 酷地球公司预定今年夏天启动一百万瓦的发电设施。
